languages.text: {n}Идира немного приободряется и улыбается.{/n} "Что правда, то правда — и не такое видали! Спасибо, Лорд-капитан, я вас не подведу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира немного приободряется и улыбается.{/n} "Что правда то правда — и не такое видали! Спасибо, Лорд-капитан, я вас не подведу!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira looks somewhat emboldened by your words. She smiles.{/n} "Well, you're not wrong — we've been through worse, haven't we? Thanks, Lord Captain! I won't let you down!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира немного приободряется и улыбается.{/n} "Что правда, то правда — и не такое видали! Спасибо, Лорд-капитан, я вас не подведу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira looks somewhat emboldened by your words. She smiles.{/n} "Well, you're not wrong — we've been through worse, haven't we? Thanks, Lord Captain! I won't let you down!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}听了你的话之后，伊迪拉似乎鼓起了勇气，脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“嗯，你说得没错！更可怕的事情咱们都一起经历过，是吧？谢谢你，舰长大人！我绝不会让你失望！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks somewhat emboldened by your words. She smiles.{/n} "Well, you're not wrong — we've been through worse, haven't we? Thanks, Lord Captain! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}听了你的话之后，伊迪拉似乎鼓起了勇气，脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“嗯，你说得没错！更可怕的事情咱们都一起经历过，是吧？谢谢你，舰长大人！我绝不会让你失望！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Parece que tus palabras han reforzado la convicción de Idira. La psíquica sonríe.{/n} «Bueno, es cierto... en peores nos hemos visto, ¿no? ¡Gracias, Lord Capitán! ¡No l{mf|e|a} decepcionaré!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks somewhat emboldened by your words. She smiles.{/n} "Well, you're not wrong — we've been through worse, haven't we? Thanks, Lord Captain! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece que tus palabras han reforzado la convicción de Idira. La psíquica sonríe.{/n} «Bueno, es cierto... en peores nos hemos visto, ¿no? ¡Gracias, Lord Capitán! ¡No l{mf|e|a} decepcionaré!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira wirkt, als hätten deine Worte ihr ein wenig Zuversicht geschenkt. Sie lächelt.{/n} "Nun ja, Ihr liegt nicht falsch. Wir haben schon Schlimmeres überstanden, nicht wahr? Danke, Lord Captain! Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks somewhat emboldened by your words. She smiles.{/n} "Well, you're not wrong — we've been through worse, haven't we? Thanks, Lord Captain! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira wirkt, als hätten deine Worte ihr ein wenig Zuversicht geschenkt. Sie lächelt.{/n} "Nun ja, Ihr liegt nicht falsch. Wir haben schon Schlimmeres überstanden, nicht wahr? Danke, Lord Captain! Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラはあなたの言葉に幾分勇気づけられたらしく、微笑みを見せた。{/n}「間違ってはいないわね。あたいたちはもっとひどい目に遭ってきたじゃない？ありがとう、ロード・キャプテン！失望はさせないわ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks somewhat emboldened by your words. She smiles.{/n} "Well, you're not wrong — we've been through worse, haven't we? Thanks, Lord Captain! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはあなたの言葉に幾分勇気づけられたらしく、微笑みを見せた。{/n}「間違ってはいないわね。あたいたちはもっとひどい目に遭ってきたじゃない？ありがとう、ロード・キャプテン！失望はさせないわ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira semble confortée par vos paroles. Elle sourit.{/n} « Ma foi, c'est vrai. Nous avons vécu pire, n'est-ce pas ? Merci {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je ne vous décevrai pas ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks somewhat emboldened by your words. She smiles.{/n} "Well, you're not wrong — we've been through worse, haven't we? Thanks, Lord Captain! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira semble confortée par vos paroles. Elle sourit.{/n} « Ma foi, c'est vrai. Nous avons vécu pire, n'est-ce pas ? Merci {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je ne vous décevrai pas ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sözlerinle cesaret bulmuş gibi gözüken İdira gülümsüyor.{/n} "Haklısın. Çok daha kötülerini de gördük, değil mi? Teşekkürler Lord Kaptan! Seni hayal kırıklığına uğratmayacağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks somewhat emboldened by your words. She smiles.{/n} "Well, you're not wrong — we've been through worse, haven't we? Thanks, Lord Captain! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira sözlerinle cesaret bulmuş gibi gözüküyor ve gülümsüyor.{/n} "Haklısın, çok daha kötülerini de gördük, değil mi? Teşekkürler Lord Kaptan! Seni hayal kırıklığına uğratmayacağım!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
